snippet: The man critically wounded the physician before killing himself Tuesday at Brigham and Women’s Hospital, the police said.
abstract: Massachusetts man Stephen Pasceri fatally shoots Dr Michael J Davidson, then kills himself, at Brigham and Women's Hospital in Boston.
lead_paragraph: The man critically wounded the physician before killing himself Tuesday at Brigham and Women’s Hospital, the police said.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Man Shoots Doctor and Kills Himself at Boston Hospital
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Man Shoots Doctor and Kills Himself at Boston Hospital
